# Các biến hiện có
- Diet scores:
  - HEI2020_CAT: Healthy Eating Index-2020
  - AHEI_CAT: Alternate Healthy Eating Index
  - DASH_CAT: Dietary Approaches to Stop Hypertension
  - aMED_CAT: Alternate Mediterranean Diet
  - DII_CAT: Dietary Inflammatory Index
  - PHDI_CAT: Planetary Health Diet Index
- Chronic diseases:
  - M_CVD: Major cardiovascular disease
  - T2D: Type 2 diabetes
  - Cancer: Cancer
  - MetS: Metabolic syndrome
  - MCD: Major chronic disease
- Covariates:
  - RIAGENDR: Gender
  - RIDAGEYR_CAT: Age group
  - RIDRETH1: Race/ethnicity
  - DMDEDUC2_CAT: Education level
  - DMDMARTL_CAT: Marital status
  - INDFMPIR_CAT: Family income to poverty ratio
  - BMI_CAT: BMI category
  - OBESE: Obesity status
  - AB_OBESE: Abdominal obesity
  - SMQ_CAT: Smoking status
  - ALQ130_CAT: Alcohol consumption (drinks per week)
  - PAQ_CAT: Physical activity level
  - TOTALKCAL_PHDI_mean: Total energy intake (kcal/day)
  - DSD010_CAT: Dietary supplement use
  - DMDHHSIZ: Household size
  - mort_0518: All-cause mortality (2015-2018)
  - GHG_0518: Greenhouse gas emissions (2015-2018)

# Analysis plan
- Table: So sánh gender, age group, race/ethnicity, education level, marital status, family income to poverty ratio, BMI category, smoking status, alcohol consumption, physical activity level, total energy intake, dietary supplement use, household size giữa Q1 và Q5 của dietscore.

- Figure: Phân tích multivariate logistic regression từng dietscore adjust theo major chronic diseases, adjust theo các biến số gender, age group, race/ethnicity, education level, marital status, family income to poverty ratio, BMI category, smoking status, alcohol consumption, physical activity level, total energy intake, dietary supplement use, household size (Điểm dietscoret tính theo quartile so Q5 với Q1).
